**Chunk 1**

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,73 @@
- 
+ /**
+  * usePagination Hook
+  * Manages pagination logic and state
+  */
+ 
+ import { useState, useMemo } from &#39;react&#39;;
+ 
+ // Default items per page can be configured
+ const DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE = 12;
+ 
+ export function usePagination&lt;T&gt;(items: T[], initialPageSize: number = DEFAULT_PAGE_SIZE) {
+   const [currentPage, setCurrentPage] = useState(1);
+   const [pageSize, setPageSize] = useState(initialPageSize);
+ 
+   // Calculate total pages
+   const totalPages = useMemo(() =&gt; {
+     return Math.ceil(items.length / pageSize);
+   }, [items.length, pageSize]);
+ 
+   // Get current page items
+   const paginatedItems = useMemo(() =&gt; {
+     const startIndex = (currentPage - 1) * pageSize;
+     const endIndex = startIndex + pageSize;
+     return items.slice(startIndex, endIndex);
+   }, [items, currentPage, pageSize]);
+ 
+   // Go to specific page
+   const goToPage = (page: number) =&gt; {
+     const validPage = Math.max(1, Math.min(page, totalPages));
+     setCurrentPage(validPage);
+   };
+ 
+   // Go to next page
+   const nextPage = () =&gt; {
+     if (currentPage &lt; totalPages) {
+       setCurrentPage(currentPage + 1);
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   // Go to previous page
+   const previousPage = () =&gt; {
+     if (currentPage &gt; 1) {
+       setCurrentPage(currentPage - 1);
+     }
+   };
+ 
+   // Change page size
+   const changePageSize = (newSize: number) =&gt; {
+     setPageSize(newSize);
+     setCurrentPage(1); // Reset to first page when changing page size
+   };
+ 
+   // Reset pagination
+   const resetPagination = () =&gt; {
+     setCurrentPage(1);
+   };
+ 
+   return {
+     currentPage,
+     pageSize,
+     totalPages,
+     totalItems: items.length,
+     paginatedItems,
+     goToPage,
+     nextPage,
+     previousPage,
+     changePageSize,
+     resetPagination,
+     hasNextPage: currentPage &lt; totalPages,
+     hasPreviousPage: currentPage &gt; 1,
+   };
+ }
+ 
```

</details>

+ import { ChevronLeft, ChevronRight } from &#39;lucide-react&#39;;
+ 
+ interface PaginationProps {
+   currentPage: number;
+   totalPages: number;
+   totalItems: number;
+   pageSize: number;
+   onPageChange: (page: number) =&gt; void;
+   onPageSizeChange: (size: number) =&gt; void;
+   hasNextPage: boolean;
+   hasPreviousPage: boolean;
+ }
+ 
+ const PAGE_SIZE_OPTIONS = [6, 12, 24, 48];
+ 
+ export default function Pagination({
+   currentPage,
+   totalPages,
+   totalItems,
+   pageSize,
+   onPageChange,
+   onPageSizeChange,
+   hasNextPage,
+   hasPreviousPage,
+ }: PaginationProps) {
+   // Generate page numbers to display
+   const getPageNumbers = () =&gt; {
+     const pages: (number | string)[] = [];
+     const maxPagesToShow = 5;
+ 
+     if (totalPages &lt;= maxPagesToShow) {
+       // Show all pages if total is small
+       for (let i = 1; i &lt;= totalPages; i++) {
+         pages.push(i);
+       }
+     } else {
+       // Always show first page
+       pages.push(1);
+ 
+       if (currentPage &gt; 3) {
+         pages.push(&#39;...&#39;);
+       }
+ 
+       // Show pages around current page
+       const start = Math.max(2, currentPage - 1);
+       const end = Math.min(totalPages - 1, currentPage + 1);
+ 
+       for (let i = start; i &lt;= end; i++) {
+         pages.push(i);
+       }
+ 
+       if (currentPage &lt; totalPages - 2) {
+         pages.push(&#39;...&#39;);
+       }
+ 
+       // Always show last page
+       if (totalPages &gt; 1) {
+         pages.push(totalPages);
+       }
+     }
+ 
+     return pages;
+   };
+ 
+   if (totalItems === 0) return null;
+ 
+   return (
+     &lt;div className=&quot;mt-8 flex flex-col sm:flex-row items-center justify-between gap-4 bg-white rounded-xl p-4 shadow-sm border border-gray-100&quot;&gt;
+       {/* Page Size Selector */}
+       &lt;div className=&quot;flex items-center gap-2 text-sm text-gray-600&quot;&gt;
+         &lt;span&gt;æ¯é¡µæ˜¾ç¤º&lt;/span&gt;
+         &lt;select
+           value={pageSize}
+           onChange={(e) =&gt; onPageSizeChange(Number(e.target.value))}
+           className=&quot;px-3 py-1.5 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent&quot;
+         &gt;
+           {PAGE_SIZE_OPTIONS.map(size =&gt; (
+             &lt;option key={size} value={size}&gt;{size}&lt;/option&gt;
+           ))}
+         &lt;/select&gt;
+         &lt;span&gt;æ¡&lt;/span&gt;
+         &lt;span className=&quot;ml-2 text-gray-500&quot;&gt;
+           å…± {totalItems} æ¡
+         &lt;/span&gt;
+       &lt;/div&gt;
+ 
+       {/* Page Numbers */}
+       &lt;div className=&quot;flex items-center gap-1&quot;&gt;
+         {/* Previous Button */}
+         &lt;button
+           onClick={() =&gt; onPageChange(currentPage - 1)}
+           disabled={!hasPreviousPage}
+           className={&#96;p-2 rounded-lg transition-colors ${
+             hasPreviousPage
+               ? &#39;hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700&#39;
+               : &#39;text-gray-300 cursor-not-allowed&#39;
+           }&#96;}
+           title=&quot;ä¸Šä¸€é¡µ&quot;
+         &gt;
+           &lt;ChevronLeft className=&quot;w-5 h-5&quot; /&gt;
+         &lt;/button&gt;
+ 
+         {/* Page Numbers */}
+         {getPageNumbers().map((page, index) =&gt; (
+           &lt;button
+             key={index}
+             onClick={() =&gt; typeof page === &#39;number&#39; &amp;&amp; onPageChange(page)}
+             disabled={page === &#39;...&#39;}
+             className={&#96;min-w-[40px] h-10 px-3 rounded-lg font-medium transition-colors ${
+               page === currentPage
+                 ? &#39;bg-blue-600 text-white&#39;
+                 : page === &#39;...&#39;
+                 ? &#39;cursor-default text-gray-400&#39;
+                 : &#39;hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700&#39;
+             }&#96;}
+           &gt;
+             {page}
+           &lt;/button&gt;
+         ))}
+ 
+         {/* Next Button */}
+         &lt;button
+           onClick={() =&gt; onPageChange(currentPage + 1)}
+           disabled={!hasNextPage}
+           className={&#96;p-2 rounded-lg transition-colors ${
+             hasNextPage
+               ? &#39;hover:bg-gray-100 text-gray-700&#39;

+       &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+   );
+ }
